main event: A UFO sighting was reported on March 15, 1958, involving a white, cigar-shaped object that appeared slightly luminous and emitted no sound.
interesting points: The object sometimes appeared as several smaller objects instead of one large one., The sighting lasted 30 minutes., The description of the object is typical of unidentified aircraft displays that have been previously reported., Witnesses across Tampa called about the sighting., It could potentially be a weather balloon.
witness description: Reported by P.O. Russell, a very reliable source associated with Randall AFB.
